name: UFO Sprinter
description:
This game has been created by a team of 4 students during the GMTK Game Jam of 2020. 

The theme of the GMTK Game Jam 2020 is "Out of Control". Our team took this idea in an original way. We are restricting the player if he holds a key for too long, deactivating the key. 

With all that we made a arcady and hard kart racing game. We designed the courses to be played in a creative way if you master the spaceship movement and the mechanics. 

Now it's your turn to play, and share your best times with the world !
